results.title: LMNA gene mutation as a model of cardiometabolic dysfunction: from genetic analysis to treatment response.
results.text_hl: Moderate @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and secondary @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ were also assessed.
